languages.text: Ковчег пилигримов оказался ловушкой. Единственный путь из нее — сквозь главный шлюз, через который Вольный Торговец проник{mf||ла} на корабль. И е{mf|му|й} стоит поторопиться, пока нелюди не настигли е{mf|го|е}!

The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!
languages.original_text: Ковчег пилигримов оказался ловушкой. Единственный путь из нее — сквозь главный шлюз, через который Вольный Торговец проник{mf||ла} на корабль. И е{mf|му|й} стоит поторопиться, пока нелюди не настигли е{mf|го|е}!

traits.locale_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

languages.text: 这艘朝圣者方舟原来是个陷阱。唯一逃出方舟的道路，就是行商浪人进入方舟时穿过的主气闸。领主舰长必须赶在那些怪物追上{mf|他|她}之前，抓紧时间，逃出生天！
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: 这艘朝圣者方舟原来是个陷阱。唯一逃出方舟的道路，就是行商浪人进入方舟时穿过的主气闸。领主舰长必须赶在那些怪物追上{mf|他|她}之前，抓紧时间，逃出生天！

languages.text: 巡礼者の箱船は罠だったことが判明した。唯一の脱出ルートは、自由開拓者が船に搭乗するために使用したメインエアロックを通過するルートだ。ロード・キャプテンは人外どもに追いつかれないよう急がなければならない。
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: 巡礼者の箱船は罠だったことが判明した。唯一の脱出ルートは、自由開拓者が船に搭乗するために使用したメインエアロックを通過するルートだ。ロード・キャプテンは人外どもに追いつかれないよう急がなければならない。

languages.text: El arca de los peregrinos ha resultado ser una trampa. La única salida es la esclusa principal por la que ha entrado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. ¡Debe volver hasta ella antes de que los inhumanos {mf|le|la} atrapen!
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: El arca de los peregrinos ha resultado ser una trampa. La única salida es la esclusa principal por la que ha entrado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. ¡Debe volver hasta ella antes de que los inhumanos {mf|le|la} atrapen!

languages.text: Die Pilgerarche hat sich als Falle entpuppt. Der einzige Weg führt durch die Hauptluftschleuse, durch die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an Bord des Schiffs gelangt ist. Der Lord Captain muss sich beeilen, ehe {mf|er|sie} von den Inhumans eingeholt wird.
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: Die Pilgerarche hat sich als Falle entpuppt. Der einzige Weg führt durch die Hauptluftschleuse, durch die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an Bord des Schiffs gelangt ist. Der Lord Captain muss sich beeilen, ehe {mf|er|sie} von den Inhumans eingeholt wird.

languages.text: L'arche des pèlerins était en fait un piège. La seule issue serait de passer par le sas franchi par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour accéder au vaisseau. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit se dépêcher avant que les non-humains ne {mf|le|la} rattrapent !
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: L'arche des pèlerins était en fait un piège. La seule issue serait de passer par le sas franchi par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour accéder au vaisseau. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit se dépêcher avant que les inhumains ne {mf|le|la} rattrapent !

languages.text: Hacıları taşıyan arkın aslında bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir'in gemiye ulaşmak için kullandığı ana hava kilidi, tek çıkış yolu. Lord Kaptan, insan dışılar ona ulaşmadan önce acele etmeli!
languages.original_text: The pilgrim ark turned out to be a trap. The only route out is through the main airlock that the Rogue Trader used to access the ship. The Lord Captain must hurry before the inhumans catch up with {mf|him|her}!

traits.locale_text: Seyyah gemisinin bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir'in gemiye ulaşmak için kullandığı ana hava kilidi tek çıkış rotası. Lord Kaptan, insan dışılar ona ulaşmadan önce acele etmeli!
